column5: hey all.  fairly new to mississauga and am having a tough time finding a small independent bait shop, specifically, for roe.  checked 411.ca and found it wasn't extremely helpful, figured asking on here would produce better results. any in mind, preferrably south mississauga.  thanks in advance

lebarons sells bait i believe.. dundas east of dixie  1590 Dundas St. E. Mississauga, Ontario L4X 2Z2 (905) 273-6434  http://www.lebaron.ca/index_en.html  i have never bought bait from them but i know the one up here on woodbine has a vending machine outside that has bait in it ( sorry no beverages) lol
There's also Angling Specialties in Mississauga.... at Confederation Parkway & Central Parkway...  here's the link...  http://maps.google.ca/maps?f=d&source=...e=UTF8&z=16
